snippet: The Atlanta Hawks were melting down, their 19-point lead over the Boston Celtics long gone. Al Horford wasn't going down like that, though....
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Hawks were melting down, their 19-point lead over the Boston Celtics long gone. Al Horford wasn't going down like that, though.

headline.main: Horford to the Rescue as Hawks Beat Celtics
headline.print_headline: Horford to the Rescue as Hawks Beat Celtics
